website_summaries.verdict: Compact pocket radio outfitted with speakers as well as headphone jack. Simple and durable for travel.
pros: User-friendly operation with a turning knob
Suitable for outdoor or shop use, given its durability and small footprint
Nostalgic gift for music lovers who still love listening to terrestrial radio
cons: AM radio stations sound buzzy compared to FM ones
Only the front is retro wood-inspired
the back of the device is a regular electronic

customer_reviews.title: Nice radio if you don't get a defective one.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the radio and it's looks BUT just be aware that you are taking a chance that you might get a defective one. I saw some reviews that some were defective and had to be sent back but I decided to take a chance anyway since it's a good looking radio. Well the first one we got was indeed defective. You couldn't turn the volume knob so I followed the steps to return it and two days received another one. The second one works perfectly thank goodness. This is the only reason I didn't give it five stars. They need to QA these radios before they send them out to their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R. Campos

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this radio. I guess I didn't expect too much, being a Chinese radio, I expected it to sound tiny and have very difficult tuning. I was wrong! I'm quite happy with this radio. It is easy to tune, sounds great for a radio of it's size, you have to take into consideration the speaker size. The wood front is very nice. I selected Cherry and it looks like it.
customer_reviews.author: Wulfbait

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the look and vibe of this radio.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool little radio. I had just been telling my husband that we needed to get a transistor radio in case we ever needed one, and then I came across this. I LOVE the retro wood look. I was surprised by the sound as well. Very loud for as small as it is, and it sounds very nice. It reminds me of my younger days. Can't wait to show it off.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Cool vintage look and great reception!
customer_reviews.text: This radio can be used with or without headphones. It has a cool vintage look. It is tornado season in my state and we wanted something for our storm shelter that was able to get good reception and could update us on the weather. Cell phones dont work in the shelter. This radio is nice and compact and works well!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Simply put, A must buy.
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as advertised. Works great, Picks up an amazingly clear signal, And is very simple to use. My only gripe is that the volume wheel feels a little jammed at times, But it's solved by pushing it against the frame. Other than that, I highly recommend this radio. Small, Fun, And easy to power using any good quality battery brand. It also looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Julio Mares

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: My 92-year old dad loves the design and style of this light-weight and portable radio. My dad can even place it in his front shirt pocket while strolling on his walker. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Life

customer_reviews.title: The Little Radio With a Big Voice
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a little portable AM/FM radio that was attractive and this little vintage radio is just perfect. Great reception, good looks and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Seliger

customer_reviews.title: This thing is just about perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It really is sensitive on FM. Picks up every single station, and strangely enough, it hardly matters if the antenna is extended or left inside the unit. I live in the middle of nowhere in a deep valley and it has no trouble picking up every single station. The glowing orange dial is very charming. For some reason, during the first few hours I used it, every song it played was amazing. You know those movies where the old tube radio with the glowing dial only picks up songs from many years ago?
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice radio! Stylish, but more important, it has good sensitivity and selectivity!! Good to have a good little AM/FM analog radio. Caution: The reception went down a LOT, snd was very staticky, even though good volume. Then, I noticed the lights weren’t working, so I decided to replace the batteries, and that was the problem! All good again.
customer_reviews.author: William H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Look!  Good sound and Tuning
customer_reviews.text: I’m an amateur collector of various radio types. This is a portable replica of a vintage transistor. Compact in size. I was expecting much on sound and control because I bought it for the looks alone. I think it’s great. Sound, reception and tuning are much better I expected. Most of my smaller replicas dint hold a candle to this little radio. Great for the patio, garage and hopefully the beach soon. If this were also a Bluetooth speaker, I would pay $30 for it
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kershner

customer_reviews.title: Great Look, Great Sound.....Consider it FM Only
customer_reviews.text: The look is fantastic. The sound for a small portable is great. The volume goes Hi for it's size and is excellent. Reception on FM is very good. On AM, as others have explained, it has a loud background static and humm on all stations. If you consider it FM only, you'll be happy. If you want AM, do not order this one! I'm pleased though. I bought it for looks, nostalgia and as a small emergency radio. A nice decoration in my office. I'm happy with it. RM Tampa
customer_reviews.author: Bob M.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless.
customer_reviews.text: Two days after the 30 day return period the dial back light dies. The next day the tuning light called it quits and this piece of junk wouldn't lock in a station. Of the six stations we normally listen to, the reception was relatively clear on only one. The rest...nothing but intermittent or solid static due to a cheap, undersized antenna amplifier circuit.
customer_reviews.author: SteveVA

customer_reviews.title: little nifty radio
customer_reviews.text: the signal is really really strong, but other radio-waves (like wifi) will cause interference. the front seems actually made of wood, but the back of the radio is made of cheap plastic, i doubt it would survive a fall. you cannot move the antenna, this could have made the reception even stronger. the dial is not precise at all, you need to guide yourself with the sound when searching for a station. the quality of the speaker is really good. it has a beautiful deco aesthetic.
customer_reviews.author: Vicente

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a small radio for my office. The sound is clear and strong ant the radio is just a little bit bigger than my palm. Love!
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT CHARLES ADAMS

customer_reviews.title: Functional Beauty
customer_reviews.text: In a world of utilitarian aesthetics, it is delightful to see something as beautiful as it is functional. This real wood faced pocket radio is just wonderful. It is pleasing to the eye and to the touch. It works quite well. I love the large frequency knob. The volume is smooth. AM and FM work just fine. I'm very pleased with this great little radio.
customer_reviews.author: George Husted

customer_reviews.title: Just doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews it lasted for two weeks then died. Don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Received this radio today.
customer_reviews.text: Received this radio today. I guessed at the questions about volume control and sound quality as I've only had it 30 minutes. But, and this is very important, I can pick up AM stations in my home (NW Washington state) which I normally cannot do. I have one other radio that can receive one AM station, albeit with static. But, with this unit, no problem. A wonderful surprise. Headphone jack works well, too.
customer_reviews.author: Bobo

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sound quality....radio stands up...great look
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and excellent sound quality for the size.... The radio stands up ....slips in a pocket....take it out to the garden when weeding... Got it for local radio.....then the other morning got WBBR New York City clearly some 200 miles away.... Great looking little beauty especially when on....Soft Art Deco lighted dial with a separate orange and green indicator flanking dial lights that your station is tuned in....Given several away to friends.... This is a Great gift for a good friend.....Buy It!!!! Richard in Massachusetts
customer_reviews.author: richard shortell

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio (with a couple of considerations)
customer_reviews.text: This radio does have really good sound, all out of proportion to its small size. As others have said, even though I knew the dimensions it's still a surprise when you see it. The tuner wheel on mine isn't loose as some have mentioned, but the volume control is somewhat sloppy. Haven't had it long enough to rate the battery life, but I love that it uses regular AAs. Overall I'm happy to give it 5 stars. As a comment to Amazon, it arrived almost completely out of its box, loose inside a large padded envelope. Fortunately it seems to be undamaged. Also, the manufacturer coupon included as a "thank you" was already expired.
customer_reviews.author: music lover

customer_reviews.title: Impressive and beautiful. Good reception. I bought one as a gift and then one for myself.
customer_reviews.text: It’s really pretty. You can’t see the plastic back from the front but even that it not as bothersome as I thought it would be. I bought one for my dad who is 84 and one for me because when disaster strikes I have learned not having a regular radio is horrible because even the phones go down - hurricanes and blackouts etc ...I recommend it. The dial is is great and easy to find stations.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Minna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and no noise
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little radio. Speaker has excellent sound on both AM and FM and high non distorted volume. Picks up every station clearly and with no noise. I really love this radio!
customer_reviews.author: John E

customer_reviews.title: What's NOT to like about this radio?!
customer_reviews.text: First, it's really cute; I love the wood. And, I really like the green dot that lights up to say I'm perfectly tuned to a station. The volume is good, and the sound quality is, too. ON/OFF, AM/FM, Volume control, and tuning knob are located well; I don't mistake one for another. And the price is amazing! Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Adams

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This product is worthless. The tune dial won't stay tuned into any desired station . It is always moving. The radio from the first day it was received has a short in it. Have to tap it in order for it to come on. Looks great and that is what sold me on it. Don't get fooled by the beauty of this radio. It is worthless....
customer_reviews.author: Don L.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but doesn't really work
customer_reviews.text: Radio is adorable and I loved it at first, but it loses the radio signal after about 5 minutes every time I use it. Tried using the antenna, using it in a different place, etc., but cannot get it to work. Sometimes if I turn it off and wait a while, it will have the station when I turn it back on, but loses the signal (for all stations) after another 5 minutes. Super frustrating and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley S.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work don't bother purchasing
customer_reviews.text: After some time of playing, it no longer catches the radio stations and has a strong "out of air" high pitch noise that just rings through the room and is crazy annoying and awful. Looks great, does not work. Definitely a terrible buy. I'm disappointed and will stick to digital.
customer_reviews.author: Trinushka

customer_reviews.title: What a find!
customer_reviews.text: What a little gem! So cute, beautifully designed, well crafted, and super handy! Love this little radio! You can tell they put a lot of love into their products and at such a fantastic value. Really shocked at how afford this radio is for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: CeSa

customer_reviews.title: Easy for elderly loved one to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a loved one with dementia. It is easy for her to operate (even with tremors in hands) and lightweight so she can carry it around easily. Also, if she misplaces her headphones, she can still listen through the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Schachner

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, cheaply constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly cheaply made. It looks so cool as in the picture but the body is a cheap lightweight plastic and the speaker has a random crackle while listening. Great concept but sadly executed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Manis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little radio
customer_reviews.text: My first impression is that this is an excellent radio. The wooden exterior is beautiful, the radio is easy to tune, the sound quality sounds great, the glowing orange backlight on the dial is a nice touch. All in all I'm pleased. Can't wait to listen to it down by the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Strickler

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio with good sound and frequency
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who just wanted an “old school” radio to dial in his stations and this works great! Sounds good too. It’s smaller in person than it looked like it would be but that’s fine - Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: dial light
customer_reviews.text: Radio has a good orange dial light and it picks up stations well ,fm and am for a small radio but it could use a switch to turn light off when not needed for better battery life
customer_reviews.author: J. d.

customer_reviews.title: Major Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this radio for my husband for Christmas. He loved it so much he listened to it every day. He would even fall asleep listening to it at bedtime. I guess it couldn’t handle daily use because it stopped working after only one month of use. We tried changing the batteries, giving it a break by not using it for a while, but nothing worked. All you get is loud static. When I went on my Amazon app to see if we could return it, it said we had to return it by January 31st. So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Regular Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective volume dial
customer_reviews.text: Cute but cheaply made. It seemed to work fine until I adjusted the volume and then it started cutting in and out. Then it just stopped altogether.
customer_reviews.author: B Keaton

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't look like photo. FM sound not great.
customer_reviews.text: It was disappointing to see that this radio is not the pretty vintage blonde wood color shown in the listing. It is brown. Not light brown just quite dark brown. I bought it because I liked the look of it but it doesn't look very good. It's not my monitor either because my monitor works fine. The AM sound is good but the FM sound is not that great. It's getting harder to trust online sellers to deliver what's promised.
customer_reviews.author: Carol T

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing, this radio lost reception after about two weeks after I received it , sad because I really liked the style and sound quality and also a cool retro look , but had to return this item
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hromada

customer_reviews.title: Just okay!
customer_reviews.text: Not as good reception as I thought.. Very nice appearance and size. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Good enough!
customer_reviews.text: if you don't expect too much from it, it's cute and fun, and handy when the electric is out!
customer_reviews.author: Stella L.

customer_reviews.title: A Really Great Portable Radio
customer_reviews.text: I usually steer away from "vintage" look electronics as they have tended to dress up a really cheap product, but this radio is an exception. Fantastic reception, great volume, and the tuning dial even lights up--a really a great portable radio... Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: History Buff

customer_reviews.title: Vintage AM FM Pocket Radio
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews, chose this really cute radio to take with me when walking. Live in rural area and sound is not as good as I thought it would be. Overall am OK with it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hyde

customer_reviews.title: You can’t tell a good radio by its small size.
customer_reviews.text: The radio was good at receiving all my favorite radio programS. I listen to the radio while dressing and undressing.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Halbert

customer_reviews.title: Good price and nice little radio
customer_reviews.text: Like it lights up good sound ,😀 I like sitting out side with it. Picks station's up good🎧 added a pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Sound is very good and tuner does not drift, stays tuned to station. Digitals are the worst, this, very good and reliable. Great looking too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chiotti

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great radio overall -reception great -volume- sound is great not tinny as many small radios! Am quality! Only slight criticism! Tuning dial is sensitive ! Overall great choice for technology challenged people like my ex wife!
customer_reviews.author: barry l.

customer_reviews.title: Great portable vintage looking radio
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of compliment with the way it looks. The appearance is vintage and it is quite compact.
customer_reviews.author: Devane

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio that doesn't eat batteries.
customer_reviews.text: Great portable transistor radio, like the days of old. You need one.
customer_reviews.author: Thom718

customer_reviews.title: As good as or better than the ones I used 50 years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life and good sound. Pulls in stations well. I like it so much that I am buying 2 more for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Low Carb Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This little radio is even better than I had hoped. I didn't realize that the dial lit up until I turned it on. The sound is fantastic and it is beautiful in person.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working about a week after I received it. Worked great the first few days and now all it picks up is static. What a waste of money. I just wanted a little radio for my desk at work....
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Retro looking radio
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Christmas present. It was a hit. The retro look is lovely and the recipient loved it.
customer_reviews.author: dragonflygrl

customer_reviews.title: ITS my style
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a battery radio, it’s very handy, fits well for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Best quality and design!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but went through buying 3 different little radios with good reviews (?) and horrible quality, before I found this gem!! I go camping often and like my radio with me! This one is absolutely gorgeous with outstanding quality of sound! I highly recommend it to anyone! I love the vintage design!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Popinska

customer_reviews.title: Don’t touch that dial!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy! An old school look with great reception!
customer_reviews.author: Lilduke93

customer_reviews.title: Does it give sound?
customer_reviews.text: It is a cute radio. So cute that when the first line went all static I bought a second one. It has gone all static too. I have to find another one that works.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Austin

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cute retro transistor radio! I use it at the office.
customer_reviews.author: S.Betts

customer_reviews.title: Very very cool!
customer_reviews.text: Unique and classy! I love the way it looks and sounds!
customer_reviews.author: TED TATOSIAN

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Gray little radio, it's everything I wanted I it to be. Nice looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Parslow

customer_reviews.title: Handy, cute and useful...
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it's very handy but the tuner doesn't really pick up some of the frequencies. It keeps getting muffled. That's the only thing.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Retro Cherry Wood Case Portable AM/FM Radio!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely Retro Cherry Wood Case AM/FM Portable Radio!
customer_reviews.author: N. Callister

customer_reviews.title: Love this little retro radio
customer_reviews.text: Love this little retro radio. The sound is great! Amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: courtney m.

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for a small radio .My only complaint is the sensitivity of the tuning knob.Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Clark Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This radio has excellent sound quality and volume. Decent quality too . I love the retro look!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy D. Budka

customer_reviews.title: Cheap radio
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap radio, station dial not accurate don't expect too much
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Came in late but not bad for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Nice little radio, looks great though I wish the back wasn't plastic but an aluminum alloy like it's supposed to represent. Like the old iPod classics. Still not bad for what it is. Maybe should be a little cheaper for the quality. Very lightweight and good for picnics
customer_reviews.author: Jaden Struckmeyer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND!
customer_reviews.text: LOVED IT Well made, light up dial. Cherry is Real wood
customer_reviews.author: luvly

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat little radio. Works well and tunes in accurately. Plus it looks cool too.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wood and plastic radio with great AM/FM sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great little portable radio for your emergency bag or general listening.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: That sounds good
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a radio in the mid-1950s! That sounds good. ha-ha! This radio pocket has a headset jack so you can focus on listening to news, music or sports through the headset even in noisy environments
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute. But cheap
customer_reviews.text: Sounds cheap. Looks great. We got it for golf cart but in motion the radio does not work. All static
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reception!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible reception for a tiny radio. Truly surprised. Where i live in Alaska i have few strong radio stations. This tiny radio pulls in 5 times as many stations as my superradio. Gonna but a few more for presents. Very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Self

customer_reviews.title: Vintage handheld radio. Cute and fun.
customer_reviews.text: Love the style. Hand held. Vintage look. Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this radio stylish, it has great sound and easy tuning.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket radio made with cherry wood.
customer_reviews.text: I like being able to use headphones. This is a very nice radio with a great sound.
customer_reviews.author: kim spinnato

customer_reviews.title: Attractive radio and fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun and attractive radio. Light to carry. Customer service was really great if the radio has any squelch. Keep good batteries in it and remove so that they don't leak over time. Thank you Greadio... Listening to 105.9 The X
customer_reviews.author: AJ Vig

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay for about a week, and after that channels began to fade. Now NO channels come in at all. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: It isn't the best quality
customer_reviews.text: The off & on switch fell off as soon as I opened the package..
customer_reviews.author: Mary I. Bjorling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I want to prepare a simple radio for my bedroom. Perfect size. It looks good. The most important thing is that the sound quality is very good. I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Vintage  Radio cool
customer_reviews.text: Love this little radio . Good sound bought it to take to the ball game I am visually impaired. So when I go to ball game I Take radio head phones with me.
customer_reviews.author: Diane E.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This gets good reception and the sound is good for its size.
customer_reviews.author: Inventive Rich

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is quite good, recharges quickly and it's small size is great for portability. Nice looking finish as well. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GARY WHITE

customer_reviews.title: Fun Little Radio
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for a friend who is in the hospital, and was so impressed with it I bought myself one too! Great reception and sound. Love the retro look!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son received this from Santa's personal collection. My son loves it and uses it all the time. Perfect size to carry around. Quality appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2 months and now all I get is static. Contacted seller and they sent me a new one right away no problems. Excellent service. New radio works fine. Would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: burt

customer_reviews.title: Cutest little radio ever!
customer_reviews.text: This was the cutest little radio of great quality. I gave it to my father for Christmas and he was overjoyed with it!
customer_reviews.author: DeeLee

customer_reviews.title: This is a great radio
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 93 year old father and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: alue for money
customer_reviews.text: Radio is something I've been looking for. It meets all my needs through the radio! That sounds good. Value for money.
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: i lost one of these and so i replaced it
customer_reviews.text: i bought the first time from another seller this one cost less if the light could be turned off it would save the battery
customer_reviews.author: Psyberspace Superstar

customer_reviews.title: This radio is very attractive
customer_reviews.text: This radio is very attractive and has high quality speakers! It's a great addition to any family. Grandma likes it best.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia J. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Love it: Great for walks or making my sister jealous.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, sounds and functions great. And yes the dial lights up a nice, retro orange when on.
customer_reviews.author: Essential Worker 🛒

customer_reviews.title: Cute little radio!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I go to a lot of drive in theaters, and this works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid
customer_reviews.text: It’s just exactly what it says it is. Retro and works great. Solid and strong signal. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: D. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a few weeks. Obviously very poor quality. Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Miarm Pitsmlz

customer_reviews.title: This deserves no stars
customer_reviews.text: The box came EMPTY!!! I can’t write a review on an empty package
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but low assembly quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking radio. The fake wood looks really good. Sound quality was not too bad and reception was good. Unfortunately there was one fatal flaw. I got three samples of this radio and every single unit had a faulty volume control. The thumb wheel for volume was so tight that I could barely rotate the knob to raise or lower volume. I contacted the seller for another issue with this radio via the email address that was packed with the radio and got no response. Thank God Amazon is as good as they are at returns. I sent all three units back.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pease

customer_reviews.title: AM / FM
customer_reviews.text: I actually read the reviews before buying this item. The reviews, even with the small sample size suggests a favorable product. I would not recommend this hand radio. Get a name brand and spend a few more dollars. You’ll be more satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bert

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. He had tons of transistor radios as a kid. He loves this radio! It’s beautiful and nostalgic. The sound is pretty good. With headphones, even better! Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Missy E

customer_reviews.title: Cool radio
customer_reviews.text: Such as cool retro radio. I got lots of compliments on it. I love the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Landin Davis

customer_reviews.title: Adorable radio
customer_reviews.text: This little radio is very cute and works well. I've added it to my bathroom and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: akcober

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and qood sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a unique small amfm handheld radio from its cherry wood front with a sensitive tuner and amber light for viewing when turning the dial in the dark has great sensitivity and good sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Murphy

product_meta.title: AM/FM Portable Radio, Retro Cherry Wood Pocket Radio with Best Reception, Headphone Jack, Battery Operated Personal Transistor by 2 AA Battery for Jogging, Walking and Travelling
feature_bullets: 【2 BAND RADIO】 With a good reception and great sound, you can enjoy to listen news, music and sport through AM/FM of this portable radio. Even in power outage, you still can listen this AM/FM radio to keep in touch with outside world as this is a battery operated radio (battery not include);

【SPECIAL WOODEN SHAPE】This pocket radio has one-side cherry wood. It is special and retro making you feel back to old days while you are listening this battery operated radio. To prevent bump and scratch, the design of the four conners is smooth without edge giving you a confortable hand feeling;

【COMPACT AND PORTABLE】 As the size of this am fm radio is 4.9*2.7*1.5 inches and the weight is 0.29lb, it is suitable for you to take this pocket radio to anywhere, such as walking, jogging, hiking, and travelling. This transistor radio can stand very steadily and you can place this portable radio on your kitchen or bedroom to play without taking you too much space;

【USER FRIENDLY】 Not like the complicated operation that you need to click many buttons, you can easy to operate this portable radio. The frequency scale indication is clear for you to see and the tuning knob of this battery radio is big and easy for you to switch. An ideal gift for your parents to menory the old days;

【HEADPHONE JACK】 This pocket radio equips a headphone jack for you so that you can focus to listen news, music or sport with ear phone even in a noisy environment. Moreover, we guarranty a 12-month warranty, 30-day money back and lifetime customer service to make it no risk for you to purchase this transistor radio.
